page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: This area is undergoing a change in character,where the rural scene struggles for existence,the urban is expanding.The main road linking the Midlands with the M5 South passes through the region and much heavy traffic is in evidence. The southern part of Evesham is beginning to and will eventually lose a large acreage of farm land for both housing and industrial growth inside the area of the new By-pass. The village of Hinton-on-the Green is suffering the plight of many small villages.Its local Post Office/store,school & pub. have gone and its once self-supporting community is on the decline.A light industrial estate has developed.The surrounding land is fairly typical of rural Worcestershire,producing grain and market garden produce.
